entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
